import React, {useContext} from "react"; import {MyContext} from "./MyContext"; import Card from "./Card"; function CreateAccount() { const { //state firstName, lastName, email, password, firstNameError, lastNameError, emailError, passwError, successfullAccountMessageVisible, //functions handleClick, handleFirstNameChange, handleLastNameChange, handleEmailChange, handlePasswordChange, clearForm } = useContext(MyContext); return (

):( //if visible, hide "previous page", show success msg and "add another account" <>
Account succesfully created, {firstName}!
)} /> ) } export default CreateAccount;
